name: Dapper Dan and the Thermonuclear Bomb
name_original: Dapper Dan and the Thermonuclear Bomb
description:
YOU PLAY AS DAPPER DAN AND HAVE TO GET PAST THE EVIL!!!!!

The game consists of 5 levels, all beatable in like 5 seconds.

This game is not meant to be taken seriously at all.

I mean, just look at it and you can tell.
